      • isDirty

        public boolean isDirty()
        オーバーライド:
        isDirty クラス内 SurfaceRendererComponent.CanvasRenderer

      • render

        protected boolean render(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        定義:
        render クラス内 SurfaceRendererComponent.CanvasRenderer
        パラメータ:
        canvas - Canvas to draw.
        戻り値:
        true to end drawing. No more called in next update. If redrawing is required, call SurfaceRendererComponent.CanvasRenderer.invalidate(). false to continues draw. This behavior can be modified overriding SurfaceRendererComponent.CanvasRenderer.isDirty().

      • getView

        public android.view.View getView()
